types:type.name: response
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type response = {| access_token: String, token_type: String, redirectUrl: String |} {"example": "{\"access_token\":\"dc40e864-1c0c-44da-b8b2-422bf6472a9a\",\"token_type\":\"bearer\",\"redirectUrl\":\"\/home\/\"}"}

types:type.name: deploymentId_response
log_response
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type log_response = {| deploymentId: String, startTime: Number {"typeId": "double"}, limitMsgLen: Number {"typeId": "int"}, priority: String |} {"example": "{\"deploymentId\":\"5d41c495b734f67b2d39ca60\",\"startTime\":1564591310809,\"limitMsgLen\":5000,\"priority\":\"INFO\"}"}
